how about a 4.5G DVD VOB file? Where can I find one? Thought there would be one for sure by now, but it's all avi and crap.

My complain is not about bitrate becouse sometimes it doesn't matter too much (even if is too low like in this case), my little complain is about the screens. Are far to say just too big. You can change the format in jpg getting up to 10 times less size at the same quality.
Just look at this example:
Your ss: http://shareimage.ro/images/ql06oj0f7rsojjyzhnc.png
